item.title: OpenAI promised to make its AI safe. Employees say it ‘failed’ its first test. - The Washington Post
item.description:
1. OpenAI promised to make its AI safe. Employees say it ‘failed’ its first test.  The Washington Post
  2. OpenAI illegally barred staff from airing safety risks, whistleblowers say  The Washington Post

  4. OpenAI is plagued by safety concerns  The Verge
  5. OpenAI whistleblowers call on SEC to investigate the AI company  Mashable
